text: António dos Santos Ramalho Eanes, GColL GCL GColTE CavA (; born 25 January 1935) is a Portuguese general and politician. He was the 16th President of Portugal from 1976 to 1986. ==Other websites== *Biography in Portuguese Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese generals Category:Presidents of Portugal Category:Portuguese Roman Catholics
title: António Ramalho Eanes
